Translations.Text: Li dir Here est my daughters vi dev
Sed alas ili totally blind their lust
Consequently disaster strik them en des maten
Ni torn upside down dusx them devastating rok
This est lecion those posed intelligence
This cxiam est sistem
This est sign believers
Popol lign ankaux est transgressors
Consequently ni vengx them kaj ambaux communities fully dokument
Popol Al-Hijr disbelieved messengers
Ni don them our revelations ili disregarded them
Ili uz carve secure hejm mont
disaster hit them en des maten
ki ili hoarded ne help them
Ni ne kre heavens ter cxio them specif purpose end mond ven tial trakt them benign neglect
Your Lord est Creator Omniscient
Ni don vi 7 par great Quran
Est jxaluz de ki ni bestowed ali (messengers) ne saddened disbelievers) lower your wing believers
Proklam mi est manifest warner
Ni deal kun dividers
